scripts.repository:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=org.wcdevs.blog.awsdeployer.DockerRepositoryDeployer" -c applicationName=orgwcdevsblogcore -c accountId=000000000000 -c region=eu-central-1 --require-approval never
scripts.repository:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=org.wcdevs.blog.awsdeployer.DockerRepositoryDeployer" -c applicationName=orgwcdevsblogcore -c accountId=000000000000 -c region=eu-central-1 --require-approval never
